name: advanced_search
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool kubric_the_comprehensive_movie_news_api.
Tool description: Stay up-to-date with Kubric, your ultimate movie news API. Access top sources, search by title or keyword, and experience visually engaging cinema updates and insights.
API description: The `/news/advanced/search` endpoint allows you to search for movie news articles by applying various filters such as date, source, type, and sentiment. It offers a versatile and customizable way to explore the latest news and updates in the movie industry.

sentiment.description: Filter by sentiment of the articles. Defaults to 'positive'.

maxdate.description: The maximum date for filtering articles in 'MM/DD/YYYY' format. Defaults to '05/08/2023'.

mindate.description: The minimum date for filtering articles in 'MM/DD/YYYY' format. Defaults to '01/01/2023'.

type.description: The type of content to filter by, such as 'Article'. Defaults to 'Article'.

offset.description: The number of articles to skip (used for pagination). Defaults to 0.

limit.description: The maximum number of articles to return. Defaults to 10.
